title: BRIEF-India's Infosys Exec Says Remains Optimistic For U.S. Markets
text:
BRIEF-India's Infosys Exec Says Remains Optimistic For U.S. Markets

Stock Markets 45 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 17:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Infosys Exec Says Remains Optimistic For U.S. Markets Oct 11 (Reuters) - Infosys Ltd (NS: ) Exec Says: * INDIA'S INFOSYS EXEC SAYS 6 OF 7 LARGE SEGMENTS SHOWING DOUBLE DIGIT GROWTH THIS QUARTER * EUROPEAN MARKET IS SOMEWHAT SOFTER, SEE SOME IMPACT OF BREXIT * RETAIL SEGMENT AFFECTED BY MACROS LIKE TRADE WAS AND HAS SEEN REDUCED SPENDING * CONTINUE TO SEE SOME WEAKNESS IN EUROPEAN BANKS AND CAPITAL MARKETS * VOLATILITY IN RETAIL BUSINESS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE FOR SOME TIME * REMAINS OPTIMISTIC FOR U.S. MARKETS * TAKEN A CROSS-CURRENCY HIT OF 15 TO 20 BPS THIS QUARTER * Q2 VOLUNTARY ATTRITION UNDER 18% * SEE GOOD STRENGTH IN TELECO, ENERGY UTILITY SEGMENT IN EUROPE * HIRED ABOUT 14000 PEOPLE IN Q2 Further company coverage: INFY.NS
